text: “Di madagoaa digaula ga hagatanga, digaula ga gidee nia huaidina gau mmade o digau ala nogo hai baahi mai gi di Au. Nia ila ala e gai digaula ga hagalee mmade, gei di ahi dela e dudu digaula ga hagalee made. Nia daangada huogodoo o henuailala ala ma ga mmada ginai, ga manawa huaidu huoloo.”66.24 Mark 9.44,46,48
